definition: a hidden trouble hard to mention (idiom)/sth too embarrassing to mention/an embarrassing illness

sentences.english: I know you have something difficult to tell.
The crime ads which are popular at first were caused by 'The specialists'who are skilled in curing STD(sex transmitted diseases) .
sentences.chinese: 犯罪广告最早成气候的，是专治难言之隐的“神医”。

sentences.english: The first overwhelming generation of crime Ads are for the "highly-skilled doctors"who specialized in STDs.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪广告最早成气候的，是专治难言之隐的“神医”。

sentences.english: Li Lei thinks, of sea boat group this trade to also have a painful topic probably.
sentences.chinese: 李磊认为，海航集团的此番交易或许也有难言之隐。

sentences.english: Is there a reason you didn't tell me this before?
sentences.chinese: 你不告诉我是有什么难言之隐吗？

definition: a secret/sth best not told to anyone/confidential information
sth one wishes to keep secret/ulterior motive/a subject best avoided
to be too embarrassed to mention sth (idiom)/to find it hard to speak about sth
to be too shy to speak one's mind (idiom)
to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth/to speak and break off, then start again/to hold sth back
to want to say sth but then hesitate
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
no use to tell others/let's keep this between ourselves (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 zu2 wei2 wai4 ren2 dao4
